stepTitle: The number of cell phones produced when $$x$$ dollars is spent on labor and $$y$$ dollars is spent on capital invested by a manufacturer can be modeled by the equation $$60x^{\frac{3}{4}} y^{\frac{1}{4}}=3240$$. Find $$\frac{dy}{dx}$$ and evaluate the point at $$(81,16)$$. Round to $$3$$ decimal places.
